#Text=Geske
#Text=Geske , also known as Horgeske ( died after 1597 ) was the central figure of a witch trial in Stockholm .
#Text=Her trial belonged to the first of the witch trials in Sweden in which the Sabbath of Satan in Blockula , the Devils pact and the Devil 's mark were mentioned .
#Text=Geske was a resident in Stockholm .
#Text=She was reportedly of Danish origin , and her sobriquet Horgeske stems from the Swedish word " Hora " ( ' Whore ' ) or " Hor " ( ' Fornication ' ) , signifiying that she was a prostitute .
#Text=In September 1597 , Geske was prosecuted on charges of sorcery alongside another woman by the name Brita Åkesdotter . [ 1 ]
#Text=Geske was accused to have deprived a number of people of " power and courage " by the use of magic . [ 2 ]
#Text=A widow and her son accused her of having blackmailed them to give her " a golden ring , money and a piece of gold " , but still continued to harass them . [ 3 ]
#Text=Her accomplice Brita were accused of having caused illness on the members of a household by having placed magical objects , consistent of magical butter and the foot of a roster in that house .
#Text=Both of them denied the charges .
#Text=During the trial , a woman by the name Karin made a testimony which pointed out both Geske and Brita as guilty .
#Text=Karin claimed herself to be a witch , who recently had sexual intercourse with Satan , as had many other women in the capital .

#Text=She explained that Geske and Brita were among those women , that she had recently seen them participate in the black Sabbath of Satan in Blockula , where she had seen Brita have sex with the Devil .
#Text=Karin claimed that Geske had the mark of Satan in her nose , and that if the court made a physical examination of Brita , they would find the mark of Satan on her as well .
#Text=Upon the testimony of Karin , the witch trial against Geske grew until it implicated six women .

#Text=Reportedly , the women had manufactured magical objects of bone and other parts from humans and animals in order to harm their neighbors through magic , " and many other such evils , which was hidden under the floor of her house " . [ 4 ]
#Text=However , the trial never developed into a mass witch trial .

#Text=The court remained skeptical to the testimony of Karin : " she is not of the best kind ; she was also of the kind who rides to Blockula and it is not long since she had carnal knowledge of the Devil .
